text: David Dastmalchian ( ; born July 21, 1975) is an American actor, writer, and producer. He has had supporting roles in a number of superhero franchises: he portrayed Thomas Schiff in The Dark Knight (2008), Kurt and Veb in Ant-Man (2015) and Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania (2023), Abra Kadabra in the CW's The Flash (2014-2023), and Polka-Dot Man in The Suicide Squad (2021); he also appeared in other movies such as Prisoners (2013), Blade Runner 2049 (2017), Dune (2021), Animals (2014) and Late Night with the Devil (2023). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania Category:Movie producers from Pennsylvania Category:DePaul University alumni Category:People from Allentown, Pennsylvania
title: David Dastmalchian
